2-Year Warranty The Two (2) Year Limited Warranty applies to purchases made from authorized channels of Mokwheel. Click here for more information.

settings.subtext: Our 7-speed derailleur is engineered to provide effortless and seamless gear transitions. Say goodbye to chain drops and frustrating shifts – this derailleur ensures you're always in the right gear
Lightweight aluminum front fork, offering durability and stability for an enhanced riding experience.
Easily detach the battery for charging or storage. Its design ensures practicality and security, allowing extended rides with effortless recharging at home or on the go.
Stay informed and in control with our vibrant LED color display, offering clear and easy-to-read information on speed, battery life, and more at a glance.
Our thumb throttle provides smooth and precise control over your electric bike's power output. Effortlessly accelerate and maintain your desired speed with a simple push of your thumb.
Illuminate your path like never before with not one, but two high-intensity bulbs. This headlight offers double the brightness, casting a powerful beam that cuts through darkness
Our 44T crankset is engineered for maximum power transfer from your legs to the pedals, with perfect synergy on all PAS levels.
Rear rack with integrated brake tail light, enhancing safety and visibility for a more secure night ride.
Sleek and compact design not only complements aesthetics but also reduces clutter on your handlebars, providing a clean and unobstructed riding experience

settings.title: How long until I receive my bike?
settings.rich_content: The order will be process in 48 business hours. Once the order has shipped, a shipping confirmation email will be sent to your email. We use FedEx or UPS for shipping. Please allow 2~7 business days for the shipment to arrive to your designated location. Any delivery dates provided by Mokwheel are estimates.

settings.title: Do I need a license for riding Ebike?
settings.rich_content: No, you don’t need a license for riding Ebike. Please read Safety Instructions carefully for your safety.

settings.title: How do I charge my battery?
settings.rich_content: You can check the Battery and Charger of our E-BIKE USER MANUAL. The methods are listed in the manual with more detail.

settings.title: How to find the Ebike that fits me?
settings.rich_content: You can check our Compare Models for the differential of our Ebike.

settings.title: How to clean my Ebike?
settings.rich_content: We recommended you to take off the battery. Otherwise, you can clean the E-bike as the normal bike.

settings.title: What accessories come with Ebike?
settings.rich_content: We send a wrench, bicycle pump and front full fender, with our Ebike.

settings.faqs_question: What kind of riding scenarios are electric bicycles suitable for?
settings.faqs_answer: Mesa Lite is designed for urban roads and is suitable for daily scenarios such as commuting, school riding, picking up children, and supermarket shopping. Its lightweight structure and speed sensor system are particularly suitable for novice riders.

settings.faqs_question: What is the range of this e-bike? Is it suitable for long commutes?
settings.faqs_answer: The Mesa Lite can support about 40–50 miles of range on a single charge, which meets the needs of most urban commutes and short weekend rides.

settings.faqs_question: What is the maximum load? Can it carry school bags or groceries?
settings.faqs_answer: The frame is rated to carry 350lbs, and the standard rack can easily carry a backpack, a basket, or a side-mounted bag.

settings.faqs_question: Is the Mesa Lite easy to ride? Is it suitable for beginners?
settings.faqs_answer: The Mesa Lite uses a cadence sensor and has a gentle start assist, making it very suitable for users who are new to electric bicycles, especially women.

settings.faqs_question: Is the maintenance of Mesa Lite complicated? Is it suitable for people who don’t know how to repair it?
settings.faqs_answer: Absolutely no problem. Mesa Lite has a simple structure and mainly checks tire pressure, brakes and chains. It only needs simple maintenance every 1-2 months, and even novices can easily use it.
